flawed_nl_solution:
At first Jeff paid, $300/month x 12 months = $<<300*12=36000>>36000/year
He paid $36000/year x 3 years = $108000 the firsts 3 years.
The final 2 years he paid $350/month x 12 months = $<<350*12=4200>>4200/year
He paid $4200/year x 2 years = $<<4200*2=8400>>8400 the last 2 years.
He paid the owner $108000 + $8400 = $<<108000+8400=116400>>116400 in total.
#### 116400

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3600, not 36000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
